___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___functionSignatureInDescription.description: This is because, when you import a GMS1 project into GMS2, the "description" tag is filled with the function generated signature.
___functionSignatureInDescription.title: This rule should detect and fail if the "description" JSDoc tag has a function signature instead of the actual function description.

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___noParamDescription.title: This rule will fail if the script has some argument without description.

___markUnderscoreScriptsAsPrivate.title: Mark scripts names starting with underscore as private scripts

___ignorePrivate.title: Ignore private scripts when generating documentation

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___mismatchingArguments.description: For example, if the scripts has documentation for 4 arguments but the GML code uses 6 arguments.
___mismatchingArguments.title: This rule will fail if the script has a mismatching number of arguments.

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___undocumented.title: This rule will fail if the script has undocumented scripts

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___duplicatedParams.title: This rule fails if the script has one or more duplicated params names

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___noDescription.title: This rule will fail if the script has no description

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___noReturnType.title: This rule fails if the script has no data type for the returned value

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___mismatchingFunctionName.title: This rule will fail if the script has a mismatching script name and "function" JSDoc tags.

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___noParamType.title: This rule will fail if the script has some argument without argument data type.

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___noReturnDescription.title: This rule fails if the script has a return statement but has not documentation for the returned value

___ignore.title: Should ignore the script if the script fails the validation rule?

___warn.title: Should output a warning message if the script fails the validation rule?

___undocumentedArguments.description: For example, if a script has documentation for 0 arguments, but the GML code uses arguments.
___undocumentedArguments.title: This rule will fail if the script has undocumented arguments.

___outputFolder.title: The output folder of the documentation

___scriptPages.title: Specifies if individual pages for each gamemaker script sould be generated

___templatesFolder.title: The folder where the templates are located. If empty, the default templates folder will be used

___folderPages.title: Specifies if individual pages for each gamemaker folder sould be generated

___mergeDuplicateParams.title: If true, the arguments with the same name will be merged.

___pattern.title: The glob pattern to use to include files in the project documentation
